name: cursor-notifier
description: Local macOS/Windows notifications when Cursor AI Agent/Composer generation finishes (state machine).

cursor-notifier.enabled.description: Enable Cursor Agent notifications for this extension.

cursor-notifier.autoIgnoreGitFiles.description: Automatically add hook files to .gitignore when enabling notifications.

cursor-notifier.telegram.botToken.description: Telegram bot token used to send notifications. Format: string, e.g. 123456789:AA...xyz.

cursor-notifier.telegram.chatId.description: Telegram chat ID where notifications are sent. Format: numeric string, e.g. 123456789 (user) or -1001234567890 (group). How to get it: open chat with your bot, press Start, send any message, then open https://api.telegram.org/bot<YOUR_BOT_TOKEN>/getUpdates and copy message.chat.id.

cursor-notifier.telegram.minDuration.description: Minimum task duration before Telegram notification is sent. Format: MM:SS, e.g. 01:30. If empty, Telegram message is sent for any task duration.

cursor-notifier.telegram.includeFullResp.description: Include full agent response in Telegram messages. If enabled, the response is sent in additional message parts.
